entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
